issue.title: [R] Small docs fixes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11175](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11175). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- shell `\` is missing on the first line
- On https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/reference/write_to_raw.html, the link to `write_ipc_stream()` is broken
- the source links on pkgdown need a subdir (this might need a pkgdown fix)
- the example cmake command on README.md needs a linebreak slash on the first line

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11175?focusedCommentId=17260848) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
FYI we build the docs nightly and deploy them to https://ursalabs.org/arrow-r-nightly, are these issues present there too?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11175?focusedCommentId=17260851) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Oh, that's good to know. Most of them are still there — though some of them are a slightly different flavor of wrong. I mostly added this as a flag to remind myself to come back to it / accumulate enough of these little ones to do all at once.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11175?focusedCommentId=17264394) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
